thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | flashbay.com.au
thread.title: Jo - Active Accounting Group
thread.title_full: Flashbay reviewed by Jo - Active Accounting Group

author: Jo - Active Accounting Group
title: Jo - Active Accounting Group
text: Allister from Flashbay totally streamlined the whole process and made dealing with Flashbay simple, fast and efficient. His level of communication was second to none and at no point was i left wondering where things were up to in the process. We will definitely be using Flashbay again & I will happily contact Allister for future requirements.
